title: Wall of Thorns
content:

18m DEX Save Concentration

Wall of Thorns is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Wall of Thorns is a Lvl 6 Spell from the Conjuration school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Wall of Thorns Information in BG3
